thread.title: very good hotel in an excellent location

author: artemisk2017
title: very good hotel in an excellent location
text: i would strongly recommend it , it"s the third time that i visit it, very close to tube station with direction directly to Heathrow airport. Clean hotel with very kind personel. Nice and safe location close to the center of London and to the most of the museums.
